category.name: Product Structure.RDV

preference.name: RDV_set_default_3DBox_search
preference.preference_description: Specifies the default option type for spatial searches. Applies to spatial searches in the Structure Manager, Multi Structure Manager, and Manufacturing Process Planner applications. Valid Values: true Sets the 3D box search option as default. false Sets the proximity search option as default.
